drupalNodeEvent.title: Educational Policies and Healthy Aging in China

field_organizers.processed: Columbia China Center for Social Policy, Columbia School of Social Work, Columbia University Weatherhead East Asian Institute

field_description.processed: A considerable amount of attention has been paid to the relationship between education and the promotion of oneâ€™s own health. This talk will present our latest evidence and discuss both the upward and downward multigenerational impacts of educational reforms in China over the past few decades on healthy aging.
